name: Sort My Bits
description:
In this time and age of corrupt data being more prevalent than ever, old and fragile hard disk drives need your assistance in keeping them secure. You are being assigned this crucial task of sorting these bits; to only allow good and pure data to ever reach the hard disk drives.

Only one TB at a time.

Controls

Press ‘W’, ‘A’, ‘S’ and ‘D’ on your keyboard to open the gates connected to the data channels to allow data to enter. Beware! Do not let the corrupted data through!

If you let corrupted data through three times in a row, you will lose a bit of your maximum buffer. That hurts!

Game Rules

Your shift is from 9:00AM to 5:00PM, you must reach a definite goal of storing data by then. You can’t stop everything. What’s the purpose of those hard disk drives then?

Three times during the day, the chief hard disk will come to take the data in your buffer. Be prepared!
